General.Name: Keerti Knowledge and Skills Limited
General.Description: Keerti Knowledge and Skills Limited offers information technology education and training services in India. The company also provides academic coaching services for school, commerce, and science students; and skill development, training and placement, personality development, soft skills, and entrepreneurship courses. The company was formerly known as Keerti Software & Hardware Infotech Private Limited. Keerti Knowledge and Skills Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Mumbai, India.
